HOMEWOOD, BALTIMORE, MD., MARCH 19, 1929

J.H.U. WOMANS CLUB
TO GIVE CARD PARTY
The J. H. U. Woman's Club
will give its first card party at
the I,ord Baltimore Hotel on
this Friday, 1C1arch 22nd, at
8:30 o'clock. Prizes and refreshments will be given and,
the cost of admission will be
75 cents.
This party is the- first attempt by the Woman's Club to
sponsor any such event and it
is being held for the purpose
of acquainting the members of
the facultfras -well as for the
social intercourse between the
students'and members of the
faculty. Tickets may be ob- tained by dropping a note in ,
P. 0. Box 741, or from any
member of the Woman's Club.

75 cents.

is being held for the purpose
of acquainting the members of
the facultfras -well as for the
social intercourse between the
students'and members of the
faculty. Tickets may be ob- tained by dropping a note in ,
P. 0. Box 741, or from any
member of the Woman's Club.
